feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
